Posts.Content: thank you so much for posting the original mesage and the replies - I finish my radiation tomorrow and I am severely burned, the 2nd worst case my oncologist has seen.  I'm thin-skinned and very fair w/ freckles.  I never tan, just burn, hurt, blister, peel and more hurt.  that's what's happenning except the skin opened underneath one breast.  I really appreciate the treatment suggestions! thanks!!!!!!!!!!
